entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0208.10727] The filer has reported a schedule of investments and has provided subtotals for the InvestmentTypeAxis. The filer has also reported values for the InvestmentTypeExtensibleEnumeration concept. The values reported for the InvestmentTypeExtensibleEnumeration concept should be used as members on the InvestmentTypeAxis or should roll up in a domain-member hierarchy to the member used as a subtotal. The following extensible enumeration values have been reported but are not being used as members on the InvestmentTypeAxis or can be reconciled to this axis.
- FirstLienSecuredRevolvingLoanMember, - FirstLienSecuredDelayedDrawLoanMember, - SubordinatedUnsecuredTermLoanMember, - ClassBUnitsMember, - FirstLienSecuredTermLoanCMember, - SecondLienSecuredTermLoanMember, - FirstLienSecuredTermLoanAMember, - SeriesUnitsMember, - ClassAUnitsMember, - CommonClassAMember, - FirstLienSecuredTermLoanBMember, - SuperPriorityFirstLienSecuredTermLoanMember, - CommonAUnitsMember, - ClassALLCInterestsMember, - FirstLienSecuredBridgeLoanMember, - LLCInterestsMember, - PriorityFirstLienSecuredTermLoanMember, - CommonUnitsMember, - FirstLienSecuredLoanMember, - PriorityFirstLienSecuredDelayedDrawLoanMember, - PriorityFirstLienSecuredLoanMember.
Please ensure that these values are used as members on the InvestmentTypeAxis or are descendants of one of the following members us-gaap:EquitySecuritiesMember, whfcl:SubordinatedNoteToStrsJvDebtSecuritiesOneMember, whfcl:EquitySecuritiesStateTeachersRetirementSystemJointVentureMember, whfcl:CommonEquitySecuritiesMember, us-gaap:DebtSecuritiesMember, whfcl:SecondLienSecuredLoansDebtSecuritiesMember, whfcl:SubordinatedUnsecuredLoansMember, whfcl:PreferredEquitySecuritiesMember, whfcl:EquityExcludingStrsJvEquitySecuritiesMember, us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember, whfcl:FirstLienSecuredLoansDebtSecuritiesMember, us-gaap:SeniorNotesMember, whfcl:EquitySecuritiesExcludingStrsJvMember, us-gaap:SeniorSubordinatedNotesMember, whfcl:EquityInStrsJvMember, us-gaap:WarrantMember, whfcl:SubordinatedDebtStateTeachersRetirementSystemJointVentureMember, that are used to define subtotals on the InvestmentTypeAxis.
Rule Element Id:10727 Rule version: 27.0.0RC1 - whf-20231231x10k.htm 164
